description: Try our easy to follow Lobster Salad With Grilled Mango recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Lobster Salad With Grilled Mango Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Serve lettuce, lobster, avocado, mango and pickled onion drizzled with dressing and topped with basil.
